content:
What's Different in Chat in Lightning Experience

Chat looks and functions differently in Lightning Experience. Keep these considerations in mind whether you're starting fresh or making the switch to Chat in Lightning Experience.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience, Performance Editions, Developer Edition orgs created after June 14, 2012, Essentials, Unlimited, and Enterprise Editions with Service Cloud or Sales Cloud

IMPORTANT The legacy chat product is scheduled for retirement on February 14, 2026. To avoid service interruptions to your customers, migrate to Messaging for In-App and Web before that date.

The following feature gaps apply for Chat in Lightning Experience:

You must route chats with Omni-Channel in Lightning Experience.
The Recently Viewed Pages list view isn’t available in Lightning Experience.
Some Console API methods for Chat aren’t supported with Omni-Channel routing or with Lightning Experience.
title: Service Cloud Chat Setup and Features
